pseudo_code: chisq.test(x = data[[variable]], y = as.factor(data[[by]]), correct = FALSE)
lme4::glmer(by ~ (1 \UFF5C group), data, family = binomial) %>% anova(lme4::glmer(by ~ variable + (1 \UFF5C group), data, family = binomial))
tidyr::pivot_wider(id_cols = group, ...); t.test(by_1, by_2, paired = TRUE, conf.level = 0.95, ...)
tidyr::pivot_wider(id_cols = group, ...); wilcox.test(by_1, by_2, paired = TRUE, conf.int = TRUE, conf.level = 0.95, ...)
